name: pantheon-systems/terminus-composer-plugin
description: Composer - A Terminus plugin for running Composer commands on a Pantheon site

scripts.install-bats: if [ ! -f bin/bats ] ; then git clone https://github.com/sstephenson/bats.git; mkdir -p $HOME/bin; bats/install.sh $HOME; fi
scripts.install-phpcs: mkdir phpcs && COMPOSER_BIN_DIR=../../vendor/bin composer require -d ./phpcs squizlabs/php_codesniffer
scripts.install-phpunit: mkdir phpunit && COMPOSER_BIN_DIR=../../vendor/bin composer require -d ./phpunit phpunit/phpunit:^9
